description: Blueprints and guidelines for structuring standard pages in VibeX. Ensures design consistency, usability, and scalability.
principles: Each page must follow a clear visual hierarchy (header, main content, footer).
Pages must be responsive and optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Use consistent spacing, typography, and color tokens from the Design System.
Each page should have an empty state and error state defined.
Avoid unnecessary complexity: pages should load fast and remain lightweight.
guidelines: All pages must support dark and light mode.
Each page should define loading states explicitly.
Use illustration rules for empty and error states.
Navigation must always be consistent across all pages.
Accessibility (WCAG AA) is mandatory for every page.
